page.description: Submits the Dialog to the server.

argument.name: submitType
argument.description: optional. Lets you compare different submit values, if there are multiple buttons on a Dialog that use submit().

argument.name: additionalData
argument.description: Additional data to be submitted in the form of a URL query string.

section.description: You can optionally include a 'submitType'. If you have multiple buttons on the Dialog that call the .submit() method, by specifying the 'submitType' your code in the DialogValidate and AfterDialogValidate event handlers could test the value of the submitType value. You can also optionally specify additional data to be submitted in the form of a URL query string. For example: value1=alpha&value2=beta
section.note: The submit type value is available in your Xbasic event handler in the 'Request.Variables.__submitType' variable. The additional data is available in 'Request.Variables'

section.description: Include an optional submitType value and additional data
